explains: v. 比较，对比；把……比作；（与……）相比；构成（形容词或副词）的比较级和最高级
wordGroup: compare favourably with 比…毫不逊色，比得上
beyond compare adv. 非常好；无以伦比

sentences.en: The point of the lesson is to compare the two countries.
sentences.cn: 本课的目的是比较这两个国家。

sentences.en: It is particularly interesting to compare the two versions.
sentences.cn: 把两个版本加以比较特别耐人寻味。

sentences.en: Managers analyse their company's data and compare it with data on their competitors.
sentences.cn: 经理们分析他们公司的数据并与其竞争者的数据进行比较。
